level.heading: Charcoal.
level.text: ยง 20-609 Charcoal. All charcoal and charcoal briquettes shall be sold by weight and each container in which charcoal or charcoal briquettes are sold or delivered, shall be plainly and conspicuously marked to show the net quantity of the contents in letters and figures commensurate with the size of the container as shall be determined and fixed by the commissioner, and shall also bear the legend "CAUTION COOK ONLY IN PROPERLY VENTILATED AREAS," or a substantially similar legend as may be approved by the commissioner in a size commensurate with the size of the container and so placed on the container as shall be determined and fixed by the commissioner.
